actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that meals furnished by employers to employees which are excluded from income shall not be subject to employment taxes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that meals furnished by employers to employees which are excluded from such employees' income shall not be subject to taxes under the Federal Insurance Contributions Act or the Federal Unemployment Tax Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that meals furnished by employers to employees which are excluded from income shall not be subject to employment taxes.
